title: RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module: Documentation and Resources
content:

title: RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12010 WisBlock Sensor: Ambient Light Sensing with VEML7700
content: RAK12010 is a WisBlock Sensor that extends the WisBlock system to have ambient light sensing capability. It uses the VEML7700 chip from Vishay Semiconductors with an I2C interface making it easy to build an ambient light data acquisition system.
parent_content: RAK12010 is a WisBlock Sensor that extends the WisBlock system to have ambient light sensing capability. It uses the VEML7700 chip from Vishay Semiconductors with an I2C interface making it easy to build an ambient light data acquisition system.

title: RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > RAK12010 WisBlock Ambient Light Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12010 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12010**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base**  provides power supply to the **RAK12010** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12010**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base**  provides power supply to the **RAK12010** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
